author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: كَذَلِكَ يُذَكِّرُكُمُ ٱلْوَرْقَاءُ فِي هَذَا ٱلْسِّجْنِ  وَمَا عَلَيهِ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَاغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ فَمَنْ شَاءَ فَلْيُعْرِضْ عَنْ هَذَا ٱلْنُّصْحِ  وَمَنْ شَاءَ فَلْيتَّخِذَ إِلَى رَبِّهِ سَبِيلاً
translation: Thus doth the Nightingale utter His call unto you from this prison. He hath but to deliver this clear message. Whosoever desireth, let him turn aside from this counsel and whosoever desireth let him choose the path to his Lord.
